data.message: Lol since Em Diss on Trump, Trump supporters have been hating on Em like they were Em fans in the first place.  If you're a Em fan, your a Em fan one way these no other. And track Em just drop is 10/10  people expect him to drop a track like Real Slim Shady all the time I mean come on....

replies.message: Im not a trump supporter i jus think it sucked and didnt flow good but idk maybe its just because it was made to be a statement and not a song but either way it jus stunk lol
Lol its like what he says on the track "a flawed human I guess, I'm trying my best to not ruin your expectations and meet them"
